original_text: So Elijah went to Zarephath. When he arrived at the town gate, he met a widow. She was picking up some sticks. Elijah asked her, ‘Please bring me some water in a jar, so that I can drink it.’
korean_text: 그가 일어나 사르밧으로 가서 성문에 이를 때에 한 과부가 그 곳에서 나뭇가지를 줍는지라 이에 불러 이르되 청하건대 그릇에 물을 조금 가져다가 내가 마시게 하라

sentences.original_text: When he arrived at the town gate
She was picking up some sticks
Please bring me some water in a jar
sentences.korean_translation: 제가 마실 수 있도록 병에 물을 가져다 주세요

sentences.original_text: so that I can drink it
